steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_team_project_test_planning --> navigate to Page_test-planning
step 5: At Page_test-planning click on hyperlink_team_project_test_design_test_cases --> navigate to Page_test-design_test-cases
step 6: At Page_test-design_test-cases click on hyperlink_menu_reports --> navigate to Page_overview
step 7: At Page_overview click on hyperlink_team_project_failed_test_result --> navigate to Page_failed-test-result
step 8: Add visual checkpoint at Page_failed-test-result
